Title: Fahrenheit 451
Writer: François Truffaut (screenplay), Jean-Louis Richard (screenplay), Ray Bradbury (novel)
Actors: Julie Christie, Oskar Werner, Cyril Cusack, Anton Diffring
Plot: In an oppressive future, a fireman whose duty is to destroy all books begins to question his task.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 nominations.
